Containers.Name: Socials
Containers.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] Socials is a single-page website that stores all your social media and personal websites to share. It is similar to tappy.tech, sociallinks.co, compiled.social and linktr.ee, but open-source and built on Next.js. Your url is http://exemple.com/(user) where [code]user.json[/code] is the file containing the info OR you can create a [code]default.json[/code]. There is mine running at [a href="https://socials.dkil.ca/"]socials.dkil.ca[/a][br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/app/people[/b] This is where the json files containing someone's socials will be stored. You can see the layout and info on Github.[br]
